com.geolud.atomica.objects

Class Help

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.geolud.atomica.objects.Help

  • public class Help
extends Object
    Simple class holding the resource information for help files considering the language.
    Author:
    Georg Ludewig

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Help.HelpLanguage
      The supported languages of the game.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getInfo()
      Returns the text for alternative help information if the help file resource could not be found.
      static Help getInstance()
      Returns the only available instance used by the game.
      String getUrl(Help.HelpLanguage lang)
      Returns the resource url for the requested language.
